data: `minecraft:behavior.mingle` allows an entity to navigate to the village bell point of interest and interact with other entities that have been assigned.

data.Name: cooldown_time
data.Description: Time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the goal again

data.Name: duration
data.Description: Amount of time in seconds that the entity will chat with another entity

data.Name: mingle_distance
data.Description: The distance from its partner that this entity will mingle. If the entity type is not the same as the entity, this value needs to be identical on both entities.

data.Name: mingle_partner_type
data.Description: The entity type that this entity is allowed to mingle with

data.Name: speed_multiplier
data.Description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal
